title: Georgia, The Plan
prompt: A weathered rural clinic or health center photographed from a low angle during golden hour, with peeling paint on wooden siding and a modest entrance casting long shadows. In the foreground, slightly out of focus, a pair of worn hands holding a clipboard or documentation; in the background, a pickup truck parked on a gravel lot with Georgia pines silhouetted against a warm, hazy sky. The composition should feel intimate yet austereâ€”capturing the quiet resilience of essential infrastructure in a region where resources are stretched thin, with no people visible and emphasis on the texture of age, maintenance, and quiet persistence.
